title: Graphics Designer Needed For Amazon Seller
job_overview:
We need a graphics designer for some projects. Looking for experienced workers that understand Amazon rules and requirements.

Applicant must be able to:
Create high resolution, photo realistic graphics
Work with existing graphics to edit and improve
Create compelling video content in animation form

Ideal Applicant will:
Be comfortable with AI and AI graphics
Be comfortable editing existing content (colors, variations, etc)
Work at a good speed, finding the balance between perfection and speed

Position Details:
- Part-time (ongoing projects each month)
- Flexible hours, remote work

How to Apply:
All applicants must email a simple 1-2 minute video where you talk about your background, your expertise or whatever you are interested in talking about. Send the video to Upgrade to see actual info with the word “Rafaela” in the subject line.

In the email, please include:
- A brief intro about yourself
- Portfolio or links to previous video work
- Why you're a great fit for this job
